flavor: "We don't want you! We don't need you!"
printed_text: Play only as your first [click]. Draw 1 card for each installed clan resource. Gain 1[credit] for each tag you have.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Draw 1 card for each installed clan resource. Gain 1 credit for each tag you have.

flavor: "Subtle? You don't really understand the point of all of this, do you?" -Alice Merchant
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may take 1 tag to place 2 virus counters on this program. Interface → Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may take 1 tag to place 2 virus counters on this program. Interface -> Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength.

flavor: "The Perfect Run is when you get in, take something of value, and get back out, with no one knowing you've ever been there." -g00ru
printed_text: Make a run. When the run ends, derez all ice that was rezzed during this run.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. When the run ends, derez all ice that was rezzed during this run.

printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, when you determine the number of cards in HQ you are allowed to access during this run's breach of HQ, you may add that many cards from your heap to your grip. If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, when you determine the number of cards in HQ you are allowed to access during this run's breach of HQ, you may add that many cards from your heap to your grip. If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.

printed_text: Interface → 6[credit]: Derez the sentry you are encountering. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 6 credits: Derez the sentry you are encountering. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: "The question isn't 'should I do it?' the question is 'can I do it?'" -Kabonesa Wu
printed_text: Make a run. If you have 3 or fewer programs installed, all icebreakers have +2 strength during this run.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. If you have 3 or fewer programs installed, all icebreakers have +2 strength during this run.

printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each installed program. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each installed program. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine.

flavor: "Anyone can hit someone where they are weakest." -S'onge Galaxy
printed_text: During runs, this program gets +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength.
stripped_printed_text: During runs, this program gets +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3 credits: +2 strength.

flavor:
"Talk is free. Anything else is going to cost you."
-Jitish
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove 1 card in the heap from the game. If you do, gain 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may remove 1 card in the heap from the game. If you do, gain 2 credits.

flavor:
"Is the lack of oxygen causing distress, friend?"
-Gregory 3D3R6Z
printed_text: The Runner may trash 1 card from his or her grip at random. If he or she does not, gain [click][click].
stripped_printed_text: The Runner may trash 1 card from his or her grip at random. If he or she does not, gain click click.

printed_text: Trash 1 card from HQ: All ice protecting this server has +2 strength until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
stripped_printed_text: Trash 1 card from HQ: All ice protecting this server has +2 strength until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

flavor: "As you'll see on page 276, section CDXXIX, paragraph 47, line 102 of your contract, you are overdue for your seed upgrade, and all growth from out of date seed is to be confiscated and destroyed."
printed_text: When you score Mandatory Seed Replacement, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Mandatory Seed Replacement, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers.

flavor: AgInfusion doesn't just have patents on nearly every plant seed that is farmed on Mars—they own most of the rights to the water that the farms use.
printed_text: The install cost of each non-virtual resource is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: The install cost of each non-virtual resource is increased by 1.

flavor: "My gift to runners: isomorphic architectural protocols. Ichiban daikirai da." -Midori
printed_text: [subroutine] Swap 2 other installed pieces of ice or 2 of your installed non-ice cards.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Swap 2 other installed pieces of ice or 2 of your installed non-ice cards.

printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Data Loop, he or she must add 2 cards from his or her grip to the top of the stack.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Data Loop, he or she must add 2 cards from his or her grip to the top of the stack. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: Choose resource, hardware, or program. The Runner may trash any of his or her cards of that type, and gain 1[credit] for each card trashed. Gain 2[credit] for each installed card of the chosen type.
stripped_printed_text: Choose resource, hardware, or program. The Runner may trash any of his or her cards of that type, and gain 1 credit for each card trashed. Gain 2 credits for each installed card of the chosen type.

flavor:
"Please, speak freely. I've been tasked by the board itself to hear your grievances."
-Mandy Traut
printed_text: After your mandatory draw, reveal the top card of R&D and add it to HQ. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: After your mandatory draw, reveal the top card of R&D and add it to HQ. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.

printed_text:
You may forfeit an agenda to rez Tithonium instead of paying its rez cost.
Tithonium cannot host cards.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 resource and end the run.
stripped_printed_text: You may forfeit an agenda to rez Tithonium instead of paying its rez cost. Tithonium cannot host cards. Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 resource and end the run.

printed_text: Turn an agenda faceup and install Transparency Initiative on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host agenda gains public. Whenever you advance host agenda, gain 1[credit]."
stripped_printed_text: Turn an agenda faceup and install Transparency Initiative on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host agenda gains public. Whenever you advance host agenda, gain 1 credit."

printed_text: Install Rover Algorithm on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice has +1 strength for each power counter on Rover Algorithm. Whenever the Runner passes host ice, place 1 power counter on Rover Algorithm."
stripped_printed_text: Install Rover Algorithm on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice has +1 strength for each power counter on Rover Algorithm. Whenever the Runner passes host ice, place 1 power counter on Rover Algorithm."
